content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing good too. Thanks for asking.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy programming, reading, and spending time with my family.
Oh nice! I love singing and reading. I also enjoy playing video games.
I've been meaning to get into video games but I haven't had the time.
You should definitely try it out! There are so many great games out there.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a variety of music, but I mostly listen to rock and pop.
Cool! I love rock music. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Queen.
Those are all great bands! I love Queen too.
They're so good! What's your favorite song by them?
I love "Bohemian Rhapsody". It's such a classic.
That's a great song! Mine is "Somebody to Love"
